Package chickfila.logic

Class sales

java.lang.Object
chickfila.logic.sales
public class sales extends Object
The sales class represents a sales record in a system. It contains information such as the ID of the sale, the date of the sale, the total sales amount, and the total tax amount.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    sales()
    Constructs an empty sales object.
    sales(int sales_id, String sales_date, double total_sales, double total_tax)
    Constructs a sales object with the specified sales ID, sales date, total sales amount, and total tax amount.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Determines whether the given object is equal to this sales object. Two sales objects are considered equal if they have the same sales ID, sales date, total sales amount, and total tax amount.
